category_description: Cultivate present-moment awareness by observing thoughts, sensations, and feelings non-judgmentally.
Develop compassion and positive emotions toward yourself and others through intentional phrases.
Use detailed mental imagery to evoke calm and positivity.
Focus your mind by silently or softly repeating a word, phrase, or sound.
Combine gentle movement with mindful attention to sensations and breath.
Sit in stillness, observing thoughts and sensations without focus on objects or goals.
